"SOPA AND PROTECT IP" 

The Stop Online Piracy Act (SOPA); House Bill H.R.3261. Introduced on October 26, 2011.

The PROTECT IP Act (Preventing Real Online Threats to Economic Creativity and Theft of Intellectual Property Act of 2011; United States Senate Bill S.968)
